import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import"./styles.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ChatBox=()=>{const[messages,setMessages]=useState([]);const[input,setInput]=useState("");const[model,setModel]=useState("DeepSeek Coder");useEffect(()=>{// Unregister any existing service workers
if(navigator.serviceWorker&&navigator.serviceWorker.controller){navigator.serviceWorker.controller.postMessage({command:"unregister"});}},[]);const sendMessage=()=>{if(!input.trim())return;try{const vscode=window.acquireVsCodeApi();vscode.postMessage({command:"generateCode",prompt:input});setMessages([...messages,{text:input,sender:"user"}]);setInput("");}catch(e){console.error("Failed to send message:",e);}};window.addEventListener("message",event=>{if(event.data.command==="showCode"){setMessages([...messages,{text:event.data.code,sender:"bot"}]);}});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"chat-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"chat-header",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("select",{value:model,onChange:e=>setModel(e.target.value),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{children:"DeepSeek Coder"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{children:"GPT-4"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{children:"Claude"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"chat-messages",children:messages.map((msg,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:msg.sender==="user"?"user-message":"bot-message",children:msg.text},index))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"chat-input",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Type your task here...",value:input,onChange:e=>setInput(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:sendMessage,children:"\u27A4"})]})]});};export default ChatBox;
